text: José Rodrigo Andrade Ramos (born 3 February 1997), known as Rodrigo Andrade, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as defensive midfielder for CSA, on loan from Vitória. ==Club career== ===Paysandu=== Rodrigo Andrade was a Paysandu youth graduate, and was promoted to the first team in December 2015. He made his senior debut on 27 March 2016, coming on as a first-half substitute and scoring the second in a 3–0 Copa Verde home win against Fast Clube. Rodrigo Andrade made his Série B debut on 14 May 2016, starting in a 2–2 away draw against Ceará. After featuring in 14 league matches, he signed a contract extension until 2020 on 25 January 2017. ===Vitória=== On 7 February 2018, Rodrigo Andrade signed a three-year contract with Série A side Vitória, which bought 50% of his federative rights. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3 valign="center"|Paysandu |2016 |rowspan=2|Série B |14||0||4||0||2||0||colspan="2"|—||3All appearance(s) in Copa Verde||2||23||2 |- |2017 |25||4||10||1||2||0||colspan="2"|—||7||0||44||5 |- !colspan="2"|Total !39!!4!!14!!1!!4!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!10!!2!!67!!7 |- |valign="center"|Vitória |2018 |Série A |0||0||2||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||0||0||2||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !39!!4!!16!!1!!4!!0!!0!!0!!10!!2!!69!!7 |} ==Honours== ;Paysandu *Campeonato Paraense: 2016 *Copa Verde: 2016 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Paysandu Sport Club players Category:Esporte Clube Vitória players
